params.name: test_dataset
params.description: Dataset to run the predictions on. If it is an datasets.Dataset, columns not accepted by themodel.forward() method are automatically removed. Has to implement the method __len__

params.name: ignore_keys
params.description: A list of keys in the output of your model (if it is a dictionary) that should be ignored whengathering predictions.

params.name: metric_key_prefix
params.description: An optional prefix to be used as the metrics key prefix. For example the metrics bleu will be namedtest_bleu if the prefix is test (default)
